duties_responsibilities.duty: Create engaging design systems with a strong command of visual hierarchy, form, color, and typography.
Utilize Adobe Creative Suite, especially InDesign, and demonstrate working knowledge of Figma.
Apply highly knowledgeable print, digital, and web best practices while working within existing brand systems.
Iterate multiple compelling concepts while maintaining high-quality design executions and established brand standards.
Effectively project and time manage, coordinating a high volume of daily tasks proactively to meet deadlines.
Participate in creative critiques to hone team skills and apply feedback in a timely manner.
Manage projects from conception to completion with care, and collaborate with a diverse team of creatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or related field (Master's preferred)
